vaccinepage.title: Verification Quick Response (QR) Code (Fakamo’oni Ma’u Vave’aki ‘a e QR Code)
vaccinepage.subtitle: Kātaki ‘o fakafonu ‘a e foomu ko eni ke fa’u’aki ha’o fakamo’oni ke ma’u vave’aki ‘a e QR code

dashboardpage.contentheader: Digital COVID-19 Verification Record (Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu'i COVID-19)
dashboardpage.content1: Talitali lelie koe ki he Polokalama ‘Initaneti ki hono ma’u atu ‘a e Lēkooti Fakamo’oni ‘o e Huhu Malu’i COVID-19. Tuku mai ha ngaahi fakaikiiki ‘i lalo ke ma’u atu ‘a e link ki he QR code mo e tatau ‘o e lēkooti fakamo’oni ki ho’o huhu malu’i COVID-19. Kapau te ke fiema’u ke fakahā ‘a e fakamo’oni ho’o huhu malu’í, te ke lava ‘o ngaue’aki ‘a e tatau faka’ilekitulōnika pe ko ha tatau kuo paaki meí ho’o lēkootí.
dashboardpage.content2: Ko ha fo’i fāmili ‘e taha ‘e ‘i ai ‘enau ngaahi lēkooti ‘e fehokotaki mo e fika telefoni mo e tu’asila ‘imeili pe ‘e taha, fakahū ‘a e lēkooti fakamo’oni kotoa pē ke ma’u kehekehe mai.
dashboardpage.content3: ‘Oku tuku atu ‘e he polokalamá ni ‘a e tatau ‘o e lēkooti fakamo’oni huhu malu’í. Kapau na’a ke ma’u ho’o huhu malu’í Mei ha kautaha fetalolo (Department of Defense (Potungāue Va’a Fakakautaú), Indian Health Services (Sēvesi Mo’ui ma’ae Kāinga ‘Initia), pe Veterans Affairs (Potungāue ma’ae kau Sōtia Mālōlō)), ‘e fiema’u ke ke fetu’utaki ki he ngaahi kautahá ni ke nau tokoni atu.
dashboardpage.content4: Kapau ‘oku ‘i ha’o fehu’i fekau’aki mo ho’o Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu’i COVID-19, vakai ki he Ngaahi Fehu’i Angamahení  (<1>Ngaahi Fehu’i ‘oku fa’a ‘Eke Mai</1>).

vaccineform.filloutheader: Kātaki ‘o fakafonu ‘a e ngaahi fakamatala ‘oku fiema’ú ke ke ma’u ‘a e link ki he QR code/ tatau faka’ilekitulōnika ki ho’o Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu’i COVID-19:
vaccineform.title: Fakamatala ki he Mahakí
vaccineform.subtitle: Ngaahi fakamatala ‘oku fiema’u ‘oku ‘asi atu ai ‘a e *
vaccineform.phoneemailinfo: ‘Omi ha fika telefoni to’oto’o pe ‘imeili kaungatonu mo e lēkooti huhu malu’í. Kapau he’ikai ma’u fakafoki mai ha lēkooti ‘i ho’o ngaue’aki ‘a e fika telefoní, ‘ahi’ahi ngaue’aki ha tu’asila ‘imeili.
vaccineform.pincode: Fa’u ha’o fo’i fika ‘e 4 fakapulipuli (PIN number). Te ke ma’u ha link ke fakahū ho’o fika PIN ke ma’u atu ai ho’o lēkooti huhu malu’í. *
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg1: He’ikai lava ke mata’ifika tatau kotoa ’e 4 ho’o PIN
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg2: He’ikai lava ke ‘i ai ha mata’ifika tatau ‘e 4 ‘i ho’o PIN
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg3: Ko e PIN ‘oku ke ‘omi ‘oku hala. Kātaki ‘o toe ‘ahi’ahi ‘aki ho’o toe lomi ‘i he link ‘oku ‘oatú ke toe fakahū ho’o PIN.
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg4: Kātaki ‘o toe ‘ahi’ahi mai hili ha miniti ‘e 1.
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg5: Kātaki ‘o fetu’utaki mai kiate kimautolu pe ko ho’o toketā ki ha toe fakamatala pe fiema’u.
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg6: Ne ‘ikai lava ke mau fakakakato ho’o fiema’ú, kātaki ‘o toe feinga pē.
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg7: ‘Oku hala ‘a e fakamatala ‘oku ke ‘omí, kātaki ‘o toe feinga pē
vaccineform.note: <0>Fakatokanga:</0> ‘Oku fiema’u ho’o PIN ke malu ai ho’o ma’u atu ho’o lēkooti huhu malu’í.
vaccineform.checkboxdescription: ‘I ho’o faka’ilonga’i ‘a e puhá ni, ‘oku ke fakapapau ‘i he mahino kiate koe ko e faihala ‘i he ngaahi lao fakafeitu’u mo fakafetalolo ko koe ‘a e Mahaki pe ko e Mātu’a/Tauhi Fānau ‘o e Mahakí pea ‘I ai ho’o ngofua ke ke ma’u atu ‘a e lēkooti huhu malu’i ‘a e mahakí.
vaccineform.safe: Malu, ta’etotongi, pea pau ‘a e ngaahi huhu malu’i COVID-19 ‘oku ma’u atu ma’a kinautolu ta’u 5 mo lahiange, <1>’alu ‘o huhu malu’i</1>.
vaccineform.fhealthcareprofessional: Healthcare Professional (Tokotaha Ngāue Mo’ui) pe Clinic Site (Kiliniki)
vaccineform.subsubsubtitle: Fakamatala ki he Huhu Hoa ni COVID-19
vaccineform.Subsubsubtitle: Fakamatala ki he Booster (Huhu Tānaki) COVID-19
vaccineform.enterPin: Kātaki ‘o fakahū ho’o fika PIN na’a ke fa’ú ke ma’u tau ‘aki ho’o lēkooti huhu malu’í.

qrpage.title: Personal Digital COVID-19 Verification Record (Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Fakafo’ituitui Huhu Malu'i COVID-19)
qrpage.name: Hingoa:
qrpage.minrequirementsandroid: Tu'utu'uni fiema’u: Android kalasi 5 mo e Sēvesi Google Play ‘i he kalasi 21.18 pe ma’olunga ange.
qrpage.minrequirementsios: Tu'utu'uni fiema’u: ‘I ha naunau iOS, ngaue’aki ‘a e Safari web browser.
qrpage.incorrect:
Kapau ‘oku hala pe ‘ikai kakato ‘a e fakamatala huhu malu’i ‘i ho’o lēkooti huhu malu’í, hala ‘a e ‘aho pe hingoa ‘o e huhu malu’í, ‘e fiema’u ke ke fakatonutonu mo fakafo’ou ho’o lēkooti huhu malu’í. Fetu’utaki ki ho’o toketá ke fakafo’ou ho’o lēkootí pe <1>fetu’utaki mai. ‘E fakahoko atu ‘a e ola ‘o
‘emau ngāue ‘i loto ‘i he uike ‘e 2-3.

receivedpage.title: La’i Talitotongi ki hono ma’u ho’o Lēkooti Huhu Malu’i COVID-19
receivedpage.content1: ‘Oku ma’u ho’o kolé. Kapau ‘oku tatau e fakamatala na’a ke ‘omí mo e fakamatala ‘oku mau ma’ú, te ke ma’u ‘a e link ke ma’u’aki ho’o lēkooti fakamo’oni huhu malu’i COVID-19.
receivedpage.content2: Kapau na’e ‘ikai te ke ma’u ha link ‘i loto ‘i he houa ‘e 24, kātaki ‘o toe feinga pē mo fakapapau’i ‘oku tatau ‘a e hingoa, ‘aho fa’ele’i, telefoni mo e ‘imeili mo e fakamatala na’e ‘ave ‘i he taimi ho’o huhu malu’í.
receivedpage.content3: Kapau ‘oku ‘i ai ha’o fehu’i fekau’aki mo e <1>Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu’i COVID-19</1>, ‘oku mau ma’u ‘a e ngaahi talí. Vakai ki he (<3>Ngaahi Fehu’i ‘oku fa’a ‘Eke Mai</3>).

footer.privacypolicy: Tu’utu’uni Ngāue ki he Malu’i Fakamatala

faqpage.title: Ngaahi Fehu’i ‘oku fa’a ‘Eke Mai
faqpage.01question: Ko e hā ‘a e Lēkooti Fakamo’oni huhu malu’i COVID-19?
faqpage.01answer: Ko ho’o <1>Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu’i COVID-19</1> ko e lēkooti faka’ilekitulōnika ia ‘oku ‘omi meí he tauhi fakamatala ‘a e lēsisita huhu malu’i ‘a e pule’angá. Ko e lēkooti ko ení ‘oku ne ma’u pe ‘a e fakamatala tatau mo ho’o kaati huhu malu’i COVID-19 meí he Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC, Senitā Pule’i mo Faka’ehi’ehi mei he Ngaahi Mahaki): ko ho’o hingoá, ‘aho fa’ele’i, ‘aho huhu malu’i mo e kalasi ‘o e huhu malu’i na’a ke ma’ú. Ko e lēkooti ko eni ‘oku kau ai mo e QR code ‘a ia ka  ‘e ha SMART Health Card reader (Me’alau ki he Kaati SMART) te ne tala ki he tokotaha ko iá ho’o hingoa, ‘aho fa’ele’i, ‘aho huhu malu’i mo e kalasi ‘o e huhu malu’í. ‘Oku toe fakapapau’i ‘e he QR code ‘a e lēkooti huhu malu’i ko e tata faka’ofisiale ia he pule’angá.
faqpage.02question: ‘E ma’u fakafēfē ‘eku lēkooti fakamo’oni huhu malu’i?
faqpage.02answer: Ko e ma’u pe ho’o lēkooti fakamo’oni huhu malu’í, te ke ma’u leva ha link ki ho’o ‘imeili pe fika telefoni to’oto’o ‘oku tauhi’aki ho’o lēkooti huhu malu’i. Hili ho’o fakahū ho’o mata’ifika ‘e fā-fakapulipuli PIN, te ke lava leva ‘o vakai ki ho’o fakamatala fakamo’oni huhu malu’i COVID-19 ‘o kau ai ho hingoa, ‘aho fa’ele’i, (‘ū) ’aho huhu malu’i, mo e kautaha ngaohi ‘a e huhu malu’í. Te ke ma’u foki mo e QR code ke fakapapau’i’aki ho’o lēkooti fakamo’oni huhu malu’í.
faqpage.03question: Teu lava ‘o tauhi ‘eku lēkooti fakamo’oni huhu malu’i ‘i he’eku iPhone?
faqpage.03answer:
Te ke lava ‘o tauhi ho’o lēkooti fakamo’oni ki ho’o app ‘i he Apple Health ‘aki ‘a e fa’unga iOS 15. Te ke ngaue’aki ‘a e Safari ke fakakakato’aki ‘a e ngaué ni.
Ko e founga ‘e taha, te ke lava ‘o faitā ho’o <1>Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu’i COVID-19 ‘o tauhi ki ho’o ‘ū taá.
faqpage.04question: Teu lava ‘o tauhi ‘eku lēkooti fakamo’oni huhu malu’i ‘i he’eku Android?
faqpage.04answer:
‘Io. Te ke lava ‘o tauhi ho’o <1>Lēkooti fakamo’oni huhu malu'I COVID-19 ki he Google Play kapau ‘oku ke ma’u ‘a e version 5 ‘o e Android mo e Sēvesi Google Play ‘i he kalesi 21.18 pe ma’olunga ange.
Te ke lava foki ‘o faitā ho’o <3>Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu’i COVID-19 ‘o tauhi ki ho’o ‘ū taá.
faqpage.05question: Kapau teu toe ma’u ha ngaahi huhu fakalahi, ‘e ‘asi eni ‘i he’eku lēkooti fakamo’oni?
faqpage.05answer:
‘Ikai. Kapau te ke toe ma’u ha ngaahi huhu malu’i fakalahi pe huhu tānaki, he’ikai ke ‘asi atu ai pē ‘i ho’o lēkooti fakamo’oni. ‘E pau ke ke kamata fo’ou ‘i he fa’unga <1>Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu’i COVID-19 ke toe ma’u ha QR code.
‘Oku mau fokotu’u atu ke ke tali ha ‘aho ‘e 3-7 ki ho’o huhu fo’ou ke ‘asi ‘i he Lēsisita Huhu Malu’í.
faqpage.06question: ‘E ‘asi fakakū ‘huhu malu’i fakalahi ‘i he’eku lēkooti fakamo’oni huhu malu’i?
faqpage.06answer: ‘Oku kehekehe pe ‘a e taimi ‘o e ngaahi kiliniki takitaha ‘i hono fakahū atu ‘a e fakamatala ki he Lēsisita Huhu Malu’í. ‘Oku mau fokotu’u atu ke ke tali ha ‘aho ‘e 3-7 ki ho’o huhu malu’i ke ‘asi hake ‘i he’emau lēkooti. Ka te’eki pe ma’u ho’o lēkooti, te ke lava ‘o <1>fetu’utaki mai</1>.
faqpage.07answer:
‘Oku fakahū atu ho’o lēkooti huhu malu’i ki he Lēsisita Huhu Malu’i, kae mahalo ne ‘iki kakato ‘a e fakamatala. Ko ia ai, ‘oku mau ma’u pe ho’o lēkootí, ka ‘oku ‘ikai ko e fakamatala totonu. ‘O hangē ko eni:

° ‘Ikai fakakau mai ‘a e fika telefoni to’oto’o pe tu’asila ‘imeili pe ‘oku ‘ikai tatau
° Kehekehe ‘a e sipela ‘o e hingoá
° ‘Ikai tatau ‘a e ‘aho fa’ele’i

Ke ma’u ho’o lēkootí, feinga toe fakahū ho’o fakamatalá ‘aki ha tu’asila ‘imeili kehe pe fika telefoni to’oto’o. Ka ‘ikai pe ma’u ho’o lēkootí, <1>fetu’utaki ki ho’o toketá ke fakafo’ou ho’o lēkooti huhu malu’i pe fetu’utaki mai ke toe kole ha toe siofi ho’o lēkootí. ‘E fakahoko atu ‘a e ola ‘o ‘emau ngāue ‘i loto ‘i he uike ‘e 2-3.
Kapau na’a ke ma’u ho’o huhu malu’í mei ha kautaha fetulolo (Department of Defense (Potungāue Va’a Fakakautaú), Indian Health Services (Sēvesi Mo’ui ma’ae Kāinga ‘Initia), pe Veterans Affairs (Potungāue ma’ae kau Sōtia Mālōlō)), ‘e fiema’u ke ke fetu’utaki ki he ngaahi kautahá ni ke nau tokoni atu ki ho’o huhu malu’í.
faqpage.08question: Fēfē kapau ‘oku hala ‘eku Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu’i?
faqpage.08answer: Kapau ‘oku hala pe ‘ikai kakato ‘a e fakamatala huhu malu’i ‘i ho’o lēkooti huhu malu’í, hala ‘a e ‘aho pe hingoa ‘o e huhu malu’í), te ke fiema’u ke fakatonutonu mo fakafo’ou ho’o lēkooti huhu malu’í. <1>Fetu’utaki ki</1> ho’o toketá ke fakafo’ou ho’o lēkootí pe fetu’utaki mai . ‘E fakahoko atu ‘a e ola ‘o ‘emau ngāue ‘i loto ‘i he uike ‘e 2-3.
faqpage.09question: ‘Oku anga fēfē ‘a e ngāue ‘a e fa’unga Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu’i COVID-19?
faqpage.09answer: Ko e fa’unga <1>Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu’i COVID-19 ’</1>oku to’o ia meí he ngaahi lēkooti COVID-19 meí he fa’unga ma’u’anga fakamatala huhu malu’i ‘a e pule’angá. Fakahū ho hingoa, ‘aho fa’ele’i, mo e ‘imeili pe fika telefoni to’oto’o ‘oku tauhi’aki ho’o lēkooti huhu malu’i, pea fa’u ha’o fika fakapulipuli mata’ifika ‘e fā (PIN). Kapau ‘oku tatau ‘a e fakamatala ‘oku ke fakahū mai mo e lēkooti faka’ofisialé, te ke ma’u ha text pe ‘imeili mo ha link ki ho’o <3>Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu’i COVID-19</3>. Fakahū ‘a e PIN na’a ke fa’ú ke ke vakai’i ai ki ho’o lēkootí.
faqpage.10answer:
‘Io. He’ikai ma’u pe he taimi ko iá ho’o lēkooti fakamo’oní ‘i ho’o fakafonu ‘a e foomú. Ko e link ki he lēkooti fakamo’oní ‘e fiema’u ki ai ‘a e PIN na’a ke fa’ú pea ‘e tuku atu pe ia ki he fika telefoni to’oto’o mo e ‘imeili ‘oku tauhi’aki ho’o lēkooti huhu malu’í.
Ko e QR code ko e SMART Health Card (Kaati Mo’ui SMART) ia, ko e tatau malu ho’o lēkooti fakamo’oni huhu malu’í. ‘E toe ma’u atu ha ngaahi fakamatala ‘I he <1>https://smarthealth.cards. Ke malu’i ho’o ngaahi fakamatalá, ko e me’angāue SMART Health Card pe te ne lava ‘o scan ho’o QR code.
faqpage.11answer:
‘Io. Ko ho’o houa ‘e 24 meí he taimi te ke ma’u ai ho’o link ke fakahū ho’o PIN mata’ifika ‘e fā ke ma’u’aki ho’o <1>Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu’i COVID-19. Kapau ‘e ‘ikai, ‘e ta’e’aonga ‘a e link ki ho’o lēkootí, ka te ke toe lava pe ‘o kamata fo’ou ke fakafo’ou ho’o PIN ‘o ngaue’aki ki he fa’unga <3>Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu’i COVID-19.
Kapau he’ikai te ke manatu’i ho’o PIN, hili ha houa ‘e 24 te ke toe lava pē ‘o fai ‘a e founga tatau pea fa’u mo ha’o PIN fo’ou.
<5>FAKATOKANGA: Ko ho’o ma’u pe ho’o lēkooti huhu malu’í mo tauhi ho’o QR code, he’ikai toe ta’e’aonga ia.
faqpage.12question: ‘E ma’u heni ‘a e fakamo’oni ‘o ‘eku huhu malu’í?
faqpage.12answer:
‘Io. Ko e taha ‘o e ngaahi <1>fili kehekehe ke ma’u’aki ho’o <3>Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu’i COVID-19 pea lava ‘o paaki pe fakahā fakakomipiuta. Te ke lava foki ‘o fakahā ho’o kaati huhu malu’i COVID-19 meí he Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC, Senitā Pule’i mo Faka’ehi’ehi mei he Ngaahi Mahaki) pe ko ho’o lēkooti huhu malu’i meí he pule’angá.
‘Oku ‘ikai fiema’u ia ke ke ma’u ha’o <5>Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu’i COVID-19. Kapau ko ha fili ‘oku ‘uhinga pe ia ke ma’u ha fakamatala fakamo’oni ki ho’o tu’unga huhu malu’i COVID-19, mo e tatau fakakomipiuta ho’o kaati huhu malu’í. 'E fiema’u ke u fakaha 'a e fakamo'oni huhu malu'i? He’ikai fokotu’u ‘e he siteiti ha fa’unga pau ki ha fiema’u ha paasipooti.
faqpage.13question: Fēfē kapau ‘e fiema’u ke fakafetongi ‘eku kaati huhu malu’i?
faqpage.13answer: ‘Oku tuku atu ‘e he komipiutá ‘a e tatau ho’o lēkooti fakamo’oni huhu malu’í. Kapau ‘oku mole ho’o kaati fakamo’oni huhu malu’í, te ke toe lava pe ‘o paaki ho’o lēkootí ‘o ngaue’aki. Ka mole ho’o <1>Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu’i COVID-19</1>, te ke lava pe ‘o kamata fo’ou ‘i he fa’unga fakakomipiutá ke ma’u mei ai.
faqpage.14question: Ko e hā ‘a e me’a ‘e hoko ki he’eku fakamatala ‘o kappa teu vahevahe atu?
faqpage.14answer: Ko e fakamatala ‘I ho’o <1>Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu’i COVID-19 ‘</1> oku tatau pe ia mo e fakamatala ‘i ho’o kaati huhu malu’i meí he Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC, Senitā Pule’i mo Faka’ehi’ehi mei he Ngaahi Mahaki). Te ke lava ‘o fehu’i ki he ngaahi kautaha te nau scan ‘a e QR code ‘i ho’o <3>Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu’i COVID-19</3> pe te nau ngaue’aki fēfē ho’o fakamatalá pe te nau tauhi. Ko koe pē te ke fai tu’utu’uni ki he founga mo e taimi ‘e tuku atu ai ho’o lēkootí.
faqpage.15question: Fēfē kapau na’a ku fakahoko ‘apoinimeni ki he kakai tokolahi ‘o ngaue’aki pe ‘a e fo’i fika telefoni pe ‘e taha?
faqpage.15answer: Kapau ko e mātu’a pe tauhi fānau koe pea na’a ke fakahoko ‘apoinimeni lahi ‘o ngaue’aki pe ‘a e fo’i fika telefoni ‘e taha pe ‘imeili, fakahū ha’o kole taautaha ke ma’u kehekehe mai ‘a e ‘ū link ki he lēkooti fakamo’oni takitaha.
faqpage.needhelpcontent01: Ki ha toe fehu’i mo ha tokoni makehe, fetu’utaki ki he:
faqpage.needhelpcontent06: <0>FAKATOKANGA:</0> ‘Oku ‘ikai te mau lava ‘o toe tānaki ha fakamatala ki ho’o Lēkooti Fakamo’oni Huhu Malu’i COVID-19 ‘i he telefoní.
